original_text: Your descendants will be as many as the dust of the earth. They will go to the west and to the east. They will go to the north and to the south. Through you and your descendants I will bless all the families of people on the earth.
korean_text: 네 자손이 땅의 티끌 같이 되어 네가 서쪽과 동쪽과 북쪽과 남쪽으로 퍼져나갈지며 땅의 모든 족속이 너와 네 자손으로 말미암아 복을 받으리라

sentences.original_text: Your descendants will be as many as the dust of the earth.
sentences.korean_translation: 네 자손들은 땅의 티끌처럼 많아질 것이다.

sentences.original_text: They will go to the west and to the east.
They will go to the north and to the south.
I will bless all the families of people on the earth.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 땅에 있는 모든 사람의 가족들을 복 주겠다.
